channel.title: [Delta] Interface Opening in area [Delta]
channel.description: How can I make it that when you're in a specific area, an interface opens up? I'm not sure how to do this.

item.title: [Delta] Interface Opening in area [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

[quote=“i am infamy, post:2, topic:448127”][quote author=gangsta tony link=topic=551018.msg4038291#msg4038291 date=1341374599]
How can I make it that when you’re in a specific area, an interface opens up? I’m not sure how to do this.
[/quote]

You can basically use this and implement it to however you want

http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/279115-pi-wilderness-warning.html

change the b in serber to server[/quote]
Okay but now it only shows the interface when I log in on the spot I want. If I go back to the spot, it won’t open.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Interface Opening in area [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

gangsta tony:

How can I make it that when you’re in a specific area, an interface opens up? I’m not sure how to do this.

You can basically use this and implement it to however you want

http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/279115-pi-wilderness-warning.html

change the b in serber to server
